articles.content:
Federal prosecutors in a Monday letter said they “strenuously oppose” R. Kellys bid to postpone the sentencing date for his sex trafficking convictions in New York.
In their letter to Brooklyn feder… [+2318 chars]

articles.title: Jesse Tyler Ferguson and Jesse Williams star in a winning 'Take Me Out' on Broadway - The Washington Post
articles.description: Richard Greenberg’s outstanding baseball play receives a top-notch revival at the Hayes Theatre.
articles.content: NEW YORK Richard Greenbergs I-heart-baseball play, Take Me Out, has returned to the field for another Broadway run, and it is as robustly entertaining as it proved to be when it debuted nearly 20 yea… [+4719 chars]

articles.author: Asha C. Gilbert, USA TODAY
articles.title: Cardi B deletes Twitter, Instagram after fans criticize her for not attending Grammys - USA TODAY
articles.description: Cardi B deleted her Instagram and Twitter accounts after upset fans spoke up on social media about the rapper not attending Sunday's 2022 Grammys.
articles.content:
Rapper Cardi B deleted her Twitter and Instagram accounts Sunday after fans hounded her for not attending the Grammys. 
Fans of the "WAP" rapper took to Twitter to air their frustrations about Cardi… [+1706 chars]
